changes.desc: Completly reworked the QuestDisplay. You can now move/scale it with '/ioi editHud'
Night Vision: Got replaced with '/nightvision' by the server.
Super Breaker Cooldown now works properly with Recharge.
The SB alert no longer plays when the mine is about to reset.
ChatTabs: When in gang chat or in a private conversation prefills the chat input box with '/gc ' or '/msg {player} '.
Farming mcMMO and Replant Emerald now show the correct BossBar color.
Added a missing crops render mode setting.
Added a Yaw and Pitch Display for Farming
Updated 3d Renderer. Should be more stable now
Disabled Wither Mine feature. Needs a lot of work
